answers.author: Emma Jurado
answers.text:
Hi Ashley,
I found the attached "Construction Survival Guide" for businesses by the city of Madison, Wisconsin. Just one resource but I hope its helpful. 
http://www.cityofmadison.com/business/obr/documents/survivalGuide.pdf
Best,
Emma

author: Ashley Greiber
text:
A village in Wisconsin is planning a major Main St. construction project over the next couple of years.  Many of the business owners are worried about their businesses during this time.  We are looking for ways to advertise that they will still be open during the construction process. 
Specifically:
What have you done?
What has worked?
What hasn't worked?
Thank you,
title: Main Street Construction
